title: Wealth Creation
content: Seek wealth, not money or status. Wealth is having assets that earn while you sleep. Money is how we transfer time and wealth. Status is your place in the social hierarchy. Ignore status games; they are zero-sum. Wealth creation is positive-sum.

title: Leverage
content: Fortunes require leverage. Business leverage comes from capital, people, and products with no marginal cost of replication (code and media). Code and media are the leverage behind the newly rich. You can create software and media that works for you while you sleep.

title: Specific Knowledge
content: Specific knowledge is knowledge that you cannot be trained for. If society can train you, it can train someone else, and replace you. Specific knowledge is found by pursuing your genuine curiosity and passion rather than whatever is hot right now. Building specific knowledge will feel like play to you but looked like work to others.

title: Equity Ownership
content: You will not get rich renting out your time. You must own equity - a piece of a business - to gain your financial freedom. This is the only way to decouple your inputs from your outputs.

title: Compound Interest
content: All the benefits in life come from compound interest - money, relationships, and knowledge. Play long-term games with long-term people. 99% of effort is wasted. You have to be right only once.

title: Happiness and Wealth
content: Happiness is a choice and a skill. It is not the outcome of wealth. Wealth buys freedom, but it doesn't buy peace. Peace is happiness at rest. Happiness is peace in motion.

title: Reading
content: Read what you love until you love to read. The foundation of learning is reading. It is better to read a great book 10 times than 10 mediocre books once. Understand the basics of microeconomics, game theory, psychology, and persuasion.

title: Judgment
content: In an age of leverage, one correct decision can win everything. Judgment is the ability to make the right decision with incomplete information. Wisdom is judgment without the anxiety.

title: Patience
content: Impatience with actions, patience with results. The world is an efficient market; if something was easy, everyone would do it. Anything worth doing takes time.

title: Accountability
content: Embrace accountability and take business risks under your own name. Society will reward you with responsibility, equity, and leverage. The most accountable people are the ones who get the most leverage.
